intro.voice: Well, welcome to the survival games! The rules are simple: gather resources, build a boat, and escape the island. Let's get started!

boat_parts.name: Hull
boat_parts.description: A sturdy hull, the foundation of your boat. It keeps you afloat.
boat_parts.help: You need to build a hull first. It's the foundation that keeps your boat afloat. Gather 50 wood.

boat_parts.name: Deck
boat_parts.description: A flat wooden surface that covers the hull.
boat_parts.help: Now you need a deck to walk on. Gather 40 wood to build it.

boat_parts.name: Mast
boat_parts.description: A tall wooden pole that holds the sail upright.
boat_parts.help: Time to build a mast to catch the wind. You'll need 30 wood.

boat_parts.name: Sail
boat_parts.description: A large piece of fabric (improvised from wood) to catch the wind.
boat_parts.help: You need a sail to harness the wind. Gather 20 wood.

boat_parts.name: Rudder
boat_parts.description: A steering mechanism attached to the stern of the boat.
boat_parts.help: A rudder is essential for steering. Collect 25 wood.

boat_parts.name: Oars
boat_parts.description: Two wooden paddles for manual propulsion.
boat_parts.help: Build some oars as backup propulsion. You need 15 wood.

boat_parts.name: Storage Chest
boat_parts.description: A wooden box to store supplies during your journey.
boat_parts.help: You'll need a storage chest for your supplies. Gather 20 wood.

boat_parts.name: Anchor
boat_parts.description: A heavy wooden anchor to keep the boat in place.
boat_parts.help: Final piece! Build an anchor to secure your boat. Only 10 wood needed.

outro.voice: You have successfully built your boat and are ready to set sail! Good luck on your journey!
